title: route 66 neon effect
content:
i'm trying to create this neon "glow tube letter/#" look.  
any suggestions on a font like this or what kind of effect to try?  
i'm having to do more design than art direction these days and welcome any tips!  
thank you,  
liz

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015182217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CBP0028809_Veer_5985.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015182217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DVP4935578_Veer_4336.JPG)
author: lizthiem

comments.content: liz: "forgot to mention in my last posting that the effect would be for a logo design for print and web."

\> what kind of effect to try?

Photoshop. The most basic:  
1. Type the word etc; convert to shape.  
2. Layer Styles Blending Options dialog: Advanced Blending 35%; Blend Mode: Multiply  
3. Apply Layer -\> Layer Style \> Stroke / Inner Glow/ Outer Glow etc etc etc

If it does not work check the electrical wall outlet :^)
